column1: # Non default templates can be put in their template folder with the same name. Object names not found in the file in the template folder will be taken from the default template file

column2:
Assistance needed
Receipt Printer empty or improperly loaded.
Tap here to enter promo code
Tap here if you notice a problem.
Please keep the button pressed.\nfor up to 15 seconds\nbefore the product starts dispensing.
It appears we're out of stock.
We can't get the dispensing started.\nWe're empty or the pump needs help to prime.\nTap the problem button in case of other issues.
If the pump is working and you tried to dispense for more than 15s without success
column3:
the container is probably empty or the pump is not primed. Seek assistance or report the issue.

If no green light is on at any dispenser buttons
column4:
please press no and check again as the software will attempt to repair the issue.

Are you sure you want to stop dispensing and go to the report page?


You will only be charged for the dispensed amount
